Title: Requires demonstrations and tests conducted by the University at Buffalo to take place under the supervision of the Erie county sheriff, University at Buffalo campus police and/or town of Amherst police
Summary: Requires demonstrations and tests conducted by the University at Buffalo to take place under the supervision of the Erie county sheriff, University at Buffalo campus police and/or town of Amherst police.
LawCode: Amd Part FF ยง1, Chap 55 of 2017
ActClause: AN ACT to amend part FF of chapter 55 of the laws of 2017 relating to motor vehicles equipped with autonomous vehicle technology, in relation to demonstrations and tests conducted by the University at Buffalo
